name: collaboration/live/start
description: Start a live session with selected participants. Creates or finds the DM room for the participant set, then joins the live session. Like Discord's group call - select users, click call.

params.name: participants
params.description: User IDs or uniqueIds to include (current user auto-added)

params.name: name
params.description: Optional room name (defaults to participant names)

params.name: withVideo
params.description: Start with video enabled (default: false, audio only)

results.name: roomId
results.description: The DM room ID (created or found)

results.name: existed
results.description: Whether room already existed (true) or was created (false)

results.name: participants
results.description: Current participants in the live session

examples.description: Start live call with Helper AI
Start group call with multiple AIs
